definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to make sense/to have meaning/to have significance/meaningful/significant/worthwhile/important/interesting

pinyin: you3 tong3 ji4 xue2 yi4 yi4

definition: The road means more than the destination./It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
pinyin: lu4 shang5 bi3 zhong1 dian3 geng4 you3 yi4 yi4

sentences.english: The results have important guiding significance on the production safety of fertilizer-related enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果對相關化肥企業的安全生產有指導意義。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: What were the subtexts of this venerable tale?
sentences.chinese: 這部古老的童話所暗含的意義是什麼呢？

sentences.english: The research on Pingxiang dialect has great significance.
sentences.chinese: 萍篆方言的研究，意義重大。

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些辯解在當時卻具有必要的意義。

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 試述抗生素藥物有關物質檢查的意義？

sentences.english: The point of our pacification operations was always described as "winning the hearts and minds" of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們綏靖行動的意義過去一貫被描寫爲“深得人心。”

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anatomical structures of the posterior column of the acetabulum and the related clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討髖臼後柱的解剖學結構及其相關臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Reading comprehension is a reading process where readers can construct the meaning of version.
sentences.chinese: 讀解就是讀者建構文本意義的閱讀過程。

sentences.english: How big is the significance of Nan Qi's 3-D work?
sentences.chinese: 南溪這樣做的意義有多大？

sentences.english: However, there was no significant difference in the lowest SaO2 between the two groups.
sentences.chinese: 兩組之間最低血氧飽和度的差異無顯著性意義。

sentences.english: This study is significant for generation of ultra-short optical pulse chain at high repetition rate.
sentences.chinese: 該研究對高重複率脈衝串產生具有一定意義。

sentences.english: You feel you have something more to live for.
sentences.chinese: 你感覺生活變得更有意義和豐富多彩。

sentences.english: Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷達資料的網格化及拼圖在氣象業務中有重要的意義。

sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州連續兩年貧困率攀升具有統計學意義。

sentences.english: The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝懷鐵路修建對沿線地區經濟發展具有重要意義。

definition: meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
